effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   [Raises]{mechanic:raise} the target's [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Special Defense by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
特防を　あげる　道具。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

An item that boosts the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears
off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta la Difesa Speciale di un Pokémon
in una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Aumenta la Defensa Especial en combate.
Al cambiar de Pokémon, el efecto desaparece.

Hebt die Spezial-Verteidigung eines Pokémon im
Kampf. Die Wirkung wird mit dem Austausch des
Pokémon beendet.

Augmente la Défense Spéciale pendant un
combat. L’effet disparaît si le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 특수방어를 올리는
도구. 포켓몬을 볼에 넣어버리면
원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
とくぼうを　あげる　どうぐ。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

An item that raises the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

An item that raises the Sp. Def stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte la Défense Spéciale pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe si le
Pokémon se retire.

the Pokémon is withdrawn.
